pages.title: About the mod
pages.text: Thank you for playing this mod! This is a mod about Earth Pulsation-a brand new world view and its related settings, adding a large number of items, tools, and a whole new dimension. $(br) This mod is made using MCR, so there may be many shortcomings. If you have any comments or suggestions, please submit them on github or gitee!

This mod now supports Chinese (basic language), English (Google Translate), and Classical Chinese (Baidu Translate) (to support the zh_meme version). Due to the large reliance on machine translation, there are translation problems. If you find any problems, please feel free to provide feedback in time! $(br) This mod is open source and released in accordance with the MIT agreement.$(br)$(l:https://github.com/Ironnoob73/EarthPulsation)GitHub:https://github.com/Ironnoob73/EarthPulsation$(/l)$(br)$(l:https://gitee.com/ironnoob73/EarthPulsation)Gitee:https://gitee.com/ironnoob73/EarthPulsation$(/l)$(br2)By Iron_noob_73
